tasks.title: Initialize FastAPI project structure
tasks.description: Set up the base FastAPI project with proper folder structure, requirements.txt, and basic health check endpoint.
acceptance_criteria: Project has src/ folder with main.py
Server starts with uvicorn without errors

tasks.title: Add SQLite database with SQLAlchemy
tasks.description: Configure SQLAlchemy with SQLite for local development. Create Task model with id, title, description, completed, created_at fields.
acceptance_criteria: Task model exists with all required fields
Database file is created on first run
Model can be imported without errors

tasks.title: Implement CRUD endpoints for tasks
tasks.description: Create REST endpoints for task management: GET /tasks (list), POST /tasks (create), GET /tasks/{id} (read), PUT /tasks/{id} (update), DELETE /tasks/{id} (delete).
acceptance_criteria: GET /tasks returns list of all tasks
POST /tasks creates new task and returns it
